value.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Invests in AI for Health to Fight COVID-19
value.excerpt: Microsoft MSFT recently announced that it is dedicating $20 million to its AI for Health initiative in an effort to combat the coronavirus pandemic. Launched on Jan 29, the AI for Health initiative was started to empower medical workers and researchers with AI as well as data science capabilities to improve healthcare services around the world.
